name: Crash Course (Kakapo5775)
description:
This is a small Car Combat game that I made for the game production course.

How to play

Press T to turn on the engine

use W to go forward, S to backward

Hold A or D while pressing W or S to go left and right

your goal is to destroy all the turrets within a time limit

Those tiny black cones you will see around the map will heal you if you run over them.
